mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_member_articles (STRARTICLESID, STRCONTENT, STRINSERTTIME) VALUS (#{strArticlesid}, #{strContent}, #{strInserttime})
mapper.select: SELECT STRARTICLESID AS strArticlesid, STRCONTENT AS strContent, STRINSERTTIME AS strInserttime FROM tb_member_articles ORDER BY STRINSERTTIME DESC LIMIT 1
